WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL.
DNC 01.
1. DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED FROM VESSEL CAMBURI
   IN 04-15.55S 034-38.27W ON 30 APR. VESSELS IN
   VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC NATAL,
   EMAIL: MRCCNATAL@MARINHA.MIL.BR.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 923/24.
